title: Is Rushida Talib and Elhan Omar co-sponsors of a bill to recognize Islamic holidays as federal holidays?
subtitle: A questionable website said that the first two Muslim women elected to Congress had not wasted any time trying to rearrange the national holiday schedule.
author: David Emery
vclaim: United States Representatives Rashid Talib and Elhan Omar co-sponsored legislation recognizing Islamic holidays as federal holidays.
